Special Powers
TARGETING: Adjacent
ARMORED BATTLESUIT: Energy Shield/Deflection. // When Orphan-Maker is dealt penetrating damage, after resolutions deal 1 penetrating damage to an adjacent opposing character.
RESURRECTION IN ARAKKO: STOP. Invulnerability. When this click is first revealed, for the rest of the game Orphan-Maker modifies his combat values +1.

Ran this guy in my XoS Month 1 game. So did one of my opponents. The first thing I did was running shot base my opponent's Orphan Maker with my own. One penetrating/psychic blast later and we chain detonated each other. Very fun interaction.
